samples.name: Default Functionalities

samples.description: Essential JS 2 slider control demo of the visual representation of slider values using ticks, which can be placed before, after, or on both sides of the thumbs.

samples.description: Essential JS 2 slider control demo of the visual representation of slider values using tooltips, which can be displayed before or after slider thumbs.
